api_list.name: Times
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all subway stations where a train is stopping at the time specified

api_list.name: Subway station codes
api_list.description: The MTA uses a set of codes to refer to subway stations in New York. In order to use these codes for other requests in this API, make the request:
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-nyc-subway-data.p.rapidapi.com/stations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-nyc-subway-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-nyc-subway-data.p.rapidapi.com/stations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-nyc-subway-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Arrival times
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all subway arrival times at a given station.

api_list.name: Subway station data
api_list.description: Given a station code (see above), get name and coordinates of every station.
